items.content_html: A lightweight React-based note-taking app that allows users to add and view notes without a backend. All data is stored locally in the browser using `localStorage`. The app has a dark theme, centered form layout, and clean UI for a smooth user experience.
items.title: 0xArjunn/Custom-Note-Service: A lightweight React-based note-taking app that allows users to add and view notes without a backend. All data is stored locally in the browser using `localStorage`. The app has a dark theme, centered form layout, and clean UI for a smooth user experience.
